幕.definition: curtain or screen; canopy or tent; headquarters of a general; act (of a play)

幕僚.definition: aides and advisors of top officials

幕府.definition: (orig.) tents forming the offices of a commanding officer; administration of a military government; (medieval Japan) "bakufu", administration of the shogun

幕後操縱.definition: to manipulate from behind the scenes; to pull the strings

幕後花絮.definition: news from behind the scenes; stage gossip

幕後黑手.definition: malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes; hidden hand
